thread.title: ABB to provide electric vehicle chargers across the U.S

title: ABB to provide electric vehicle chargers across the U.S
text:
April 17, 2018 / 3:21 PM / Updated 20 minutes ago ABB to provide electric vehicle chargers across the U.S Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
ZURICH (Reuters) - ABB ( ABBN.S ) said on Tuesday it received an order from Volkswagen unit ( VOWG_p.DE ) Electrify America to provide high power electric vehicle chargers across the United States, the biggest U.S. project to date in that field. A logo is pictured on the ABB Secheron building in Meyrin near Geneva, Switzerland November 6, 2017. REUTERS/Denis Balibouse 
Electrify America plans to place hundreds of charging stations within and around 17 metropolitan areas and along multiple nationwide highway corridors, the power and automation company said in a statement. [nL1N1OD2JE] 
It did not give the value of the contract. 
ABB shares were up 1.9 percent at 1455 GMT, outperforming a 1 percent higher Swiss bluechip index .SSMI . Reporting by Silke Koltrowitz; editing by David Evans
